LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.StandardDeviationDivider: Raise this to have size-percent be more clustered around the middle of the selected variation. Set it lower to make it more random.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.defaultvariation.label: Default variation
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.variations.label: Custom variations
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.resetgame.dialog: Do you want to reset all generated sizes of all pawns? All pawns will generate a new random size based on the current mod-settings.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.realbodysize.label: Also modify actual bodysize
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.realbodysize.tooltip: The changed bodysize will affect any calculation based on body-size. For example bed-use, pen-size, food-need, bullets stopping power.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.realhealthscale.label: Also modify health scaling
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.realhealthscale.tooltip: Bodysize will also affect the amount of health points for pawns and animals. This will affect all bodyparts and how much damage they can take.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.realhungerrate.label: Also modify hunger rate
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.realhungerrate.tooltip: Bodysize will also affect the hunger rate for pawns and animals. This will affect the amount of food needed to keep the pawn healthy.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.meleedamage.label: Also modify melee damage
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.meleedamage.tooltip: Bodysize will also affect the amount of melee damage a pawn/animal can inflict.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.meleedodgechance.label: Also modify melee dodge chance
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.meleedodgechance.tooltip: Bodysize will also affect the melee dodge chance of a pawn/animal.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.harvestyield.label: Also modify animal product yield
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.harvestyield.tooltip: Bodysize will also affect the amount of products received when milking/shearing etc.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.lactating.label: Also modify humanoid lactation (Biotech)
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.lactating.tooltip: Bodysize will also affect the maximum amount and production rate of milk for humanoids.
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.logging.label: Verbose logging
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.ignoreMechs.label: Ignore Mechanoids
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.ignoreMechs.tooltip: All mechanoids will use the default size
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.ignoreVehicles.label: Ignore Vehicles
LanguageData.VariedBodySizes.ignoreVehicles.tooltip: All vehicles will use the default size
